# Contributing

Before contributing to this project, please read the introductory paper for the modified diffusion entropy analysis method: [Culbreth, G., Baxley, J. and Lambert, D., 2023. Detecting temporal scaling with modified diffusion entropy analysis. _arXiv preprint arXiv:2311.11453_](https://doi.org/10.48550/arXiv.2311.11453).
